resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/108808</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>108808</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206547</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Reviled and Revered: Toads, Turtles, Snakes, Salamanders, and Other Creepers and Crawlers</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Reviled und Revered: Kröten, Schildkröten,
Schlangen, Salamanders und andere Kriechpflanzen und Gleisketten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Reviled et Vénéré : Crapauds, 
tortues, serpents, Salamanders, et d'autres Plantes grimpantes et chenilles</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Reviled e Revered: Sapos, tartarugas, 
serpentes, Salamanders, e outros creepers e esteiras rolantes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Reviled e Revered: Rospi, tartarughe, 
serpenti, Salamanders ed altri creepers e cingoli</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Reviled και σεβαστός: Φρύνοι, χελώνες, 
φίδια, Salamanders, και άλλες αναρριχητικά φυτά και 
αντιολισθητικές αλυσίδες</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Reviled y Venerado: Sapos, tortugas,
serpientes, Salamanders, y otras camillas y correas eslabonadas</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">examines misconceptions about herps (the collective name given to reptiles and amphibians), how herps have been viewed throughout history, and how reptiles and amphibians are similar to and different from one another.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Social Sciences</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">überprüft Mißverständnisse über herps (den 
Sammelnamen gegeben den Reptilien und den Amphibien), wie herps 
während der Geschichte angesehen worden sind und wie Reptilien und 
Amphibien ähnlich und zu einem anders unterschiedlich sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">examine des idées fausses au sujet des herps (le 
nom collectif donné aux reptiles et aux amphibies), à comment des 
herps ont été visualisés à travers l'histoire, et à la façon 
dont les reptiles et les amphibies sont semblables et différents les 
uns des autres.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">examina misconceptions sobre herps (o nome 
coletivo dado aos répteis e aos anfíbios), a como os herps foram 
vistos durante todo o history, e a como os répteis e os anfíbios 
são similares e diferentes de um outro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">esamina le idee sbagliate circa i herps (il nome 
collettivo dato ai rettili ed agli anfibi), a come i herps sono stati 
osservati attraverso la storia ed a come i rettili e gli anfibi sono 
simili e differenti l'un l'altro.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">εξετάζει τις παρερμηνείες για τα herps (το συλλογικό
όνομα που δίνεται στα ερπετά και τα αμφίβια), πώς herps έχει 
εμφανιστεί καθ' όλη τη διάρκεια της ιστορίας, και πώς τα ερπετά 
και τα αμφίβια είναι παρόμοια με και διαφορετικά μεταξύ τους.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">examina ideas falsas sobre los herps (el nombre 
colectivo dado a los reptiles y a los anfibios), cómo los herps se 
han visto a través de la historia, y a cómo los reptiles y los 
anfibios son similares y diferentes a partir del uno otro.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sozialwissenschaften</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les Sciences Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciências Sociais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienze Sociali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κοινωνικές επιστήμες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencias Sociales</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770206547</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>108808</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/courses/reviled-and-revered-toads-turtles-snakes-salamanders-and-other-creepers-and-crawlers</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
